title: Unleashed
description: New Year's Resolutions:#1: Control own destiny#2: Save Earth#3: Don't fall for an alienLacey Garrett is determined to take back the business and self-respect her ex-fiancé stole from her. But her resolutions seem trivial when she's suddenly teleported to a strange planet, courtesy of the most gorgeous male specimen in the universe.Interstellar fugitive Zain Masters needs Lacey's help to turn off the energy field that has stranded him on a wasteland planet. He has every intention of beaming her back to her own world safe and sound—until a system failure traps them both. Forced to work together to repair his ship, Zain and Lacey try to fight their mutual attraction—when they stumble upon a cosmic conspiracy that threatens not only Earth, but the entire galaxy.
author: C.J. Barry
